p:
Even when reused, a 7 % solution with a contact time of 5Â min was able to show an almost 5 log 10 reduction in infectivity of poliovirus, showing that some disinfectant activity was still present.
91 A sonicated hydrogen peroxide system with a cartridge containing hydrogen peroxide at 31.5% and 2 min contact time showed that it could attain a mean log 10 reduction of 5.20 for human papillomavirus (HPV).
92
